code:
import i18n from'i18next';import{initReactI18next}from'react-i18next';import enTranslation from'./locales/en.json';// Import translations for all languages
import frTranslation from'./locales/fr.json';import ruTranslation from'./locales/ru.json';import zhTranslation from'./locales/zh.json';i18n.use(initReactI18next).init({resources:{en:{translation:enTranslation},fr:{translation:frTranslation},ru:{translation:ruTranslation},zh:{translation:zhTranslation}},lng:'en',// Default language
interpolation:{escapeValue:false// React already does escaping
}});export default i18n;// Make sure to export the i18n instance
